ps1.3:1.1_0: Soḷasavatthukaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhiṁ bhāvayato samadhikāni dve ñāṇasatāni uppajjanti—
ps1.3:2.1_0: Katamāni aṭṭha paripanthe ñāṇāni, aṭṭha ca upakāre ñāṇāni?
ps1.3:2.2_0: Kāmacchando samādhissa paripantho, nekkhammaṁ samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.3_0: Byāpādo samādhissa paripantho, abyāpādo samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.4_0: Thinamiddhaṁ samādhissa paripantho, ālokasaññā samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.5_0: Uddhaccaṁ samādhissa paripantho, avikkhepo samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.6_0: Vicikicchā samādhissa paripantho, dhammavavatthānaṁ samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.7_0: Avijjā samādhissa paripantho, ñāṇaṁ samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.8_0: Arati samādhissa paripantho, pāmojjaṁ samādhissa upakāraṁ.
ps1.3:2.9_0: Sabbepi akusalā dhammā samādhissa paripanthā, sabbepi kusalā dhammā samādhissa upakārā.
ps1.3:2.10_0: Imāni aṭṭha paripanthe ñāṇāni, aṭṭha ca upakāre ñāṇāni.
ps1.3:3.1_0: Imehi soḷasahi ākārehi uducitaṁ cittaṁ samuducitaṁ cittaṁ ekatte santiṭṭhati, nīvaraṇehi visujjhati.
ps1.3:7.4_0: Tena ca kāmacchandena nivutattā nekkhammaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:8.4_0: Tena ca byāpādena nivutattā abyāpādaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:9.4_0: Tena ca thinamiddhena nivutattā ālokasaññaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:10.4_0: Tena ca uddhaccena nivutattā avikkhepaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:11.4_0: Tāya ca vicikicchāya nivutattā dhammavavatthānaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:12.4_0: Tāya ca avijjāya nivutattā ñāṇaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:13.4_0: Tāya ca aratiyā nivutattā pāmojjaṁ ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:14.2_0: Tehi ca kusalehi dhammehi ariyā niyyanti.
ps1.3:14.4_0: Tehi ca akusalehi dhammehi nivutattā kusale dhamme ariyānaṁ niyyānaṁ nappajānātīti—
ps1.3:15.1_0: Imehi ca pana nīvaraṇehi visuddhacittassa soḷasavatthukaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhiṁ bhāvayato khaṇikasamodhānā katame aṭṭhārasa upakkilesā uppajjanti?
ps1.3:15.2_0: Assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattavikkhepagataṁ cittaṁ samādhissa paripantho.
ps1.3:15.3_0: Passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhāvikkhepagataṁ cittaṁ samādhissa paripantho.
ps1.3:27.1_0: Assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṁ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:27.2_0: Passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṁ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhāvikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:27.3_0: Assāsapaṭikaṅkhanāya nikantiyā taṇhācariyāya kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:27.4_0: Passāsapaṭikaṅkhanāya nikantiyā taṇhācariyāya kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:27.5_0: Assāsenābhitunnassa passāsapaṭilābhe mucchitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:27.6_0: Passāsenābhitunnassa assāsapaṭilābhe mucchitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.1_0: Nimittaṁ āvajjato assāse cittaṁ vikampitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.2_0: Assāsaṁ āvajjato nimitte cittaṁ vikampitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.3_0: Nimittaṁ āvajjato passāse cittaṁ vikampitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.4_0: Passāsaṁ āvajjato nimitte cittaṁ vikampitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.5_0: Assāsaṁ āvajjato passāse cittaṁ vikampitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.6_0: Passāsaṁ āvajjato assāse cittaṁ vikampitattā kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.7_0: Atītānudhāvanena cittena vikkhepānupatitena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.8_0: Anāgatapaṭikaṅkhanena cittena vikampitena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.9_0: Līnena cittena kosajjānupatitena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.10_0: Atipaggahitena cittena uddhaccānupatitena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.11_0: Abhinatena cittena rāgānupatitena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:28.12_0: Apanatena cittena byāpādānupatitena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā ca.
ps1.3:31.1_0: Imehi ca pana nīvaraṇehi visuddhacittassa soḷasavatthukaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhiṁ bhāvayato khaṇikasamodhānā ime aṭṭhārasa upakkilesā uppajjanti.
ps1.3:32.20_0: Imehi chahi ṭhānehi parisuddhaṁ cittaṁ pariyodātaṁ ekattagataṁ hoti.
ps1.3:33.4_0: imehi catūhi ṭhānehi ekattagataṁ cittaṁ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti,
ps1.3:34.1_0: Paṭhamassa jhānassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
ps1.3:34.2_0: Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, sampahaṁsanā pariyosānaṁ.
ps1.3:34.6_0: Yo tassa paripantho tato cittaṁ visujjhati,
ps1.3:34.7_1: yañca visuddhattā cittaṁ majjhimaṁ samathanimittaṁ paṭipajjati,
ps1.3:35.4_0: Visuddhaṁ cittaṁ ajjhupekkhati, samathapaṭipannaṁ ajjhupekkhati, ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ ajjhupekkhati.
ps1.3:36.9_0: Evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ vitakkasampannañceva hoti vicārasampannañca
ps1.3:36.9_1: pītisampannañca sukhasampannañca cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca saddhāsampannañca vīriyasampannañca satisampannañca
ps1.3:37.1_0: Dutiyassa jhānassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
ps1.3:37.2_0: Dutiyassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, sampahaṁsanā pariyosānaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:37.3_0: evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ pītisampannañceva hoti sukhasampannañca
ps1.3:37.3_1: cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca saddhāsampannañca vīriyasampannañca satisampannañca samādhisampannañca
ps1.3:38.1_0: Tatiyassa jhānassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:38.2_0: evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ sukhasampannañceva hoti cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca
ps1.3:39.1_0: Catutthassa jhānassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:39.2_0: evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannañca upekkhāsampannañceva hoti cittassa
ps1.3:39.2_1: adhiṭṭhānasampannañca saddhāsampannañca vīriyasampannañca satisampannañca samādhisampannañca paññāsampannañca.
ps1.3:40.4_0: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:40.5_0: evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ upekkhāsampannañceva hoti cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca …pe…
ps1.3:41.1_0: Aniccānupassanāya ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:41.2_0: evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ vitakkasampannañceva hoti vicārasampannañca
ps1.3:41.2_1: pītisampannañca sukhasampannañca cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca saddhāsampannañca vīriyasampannañca satisampannañca
ps1.3:42.4_0: arahattamaggassa ko ādi, kiṁ majjhe, kiṁ pariyosānaṁ?
ps1.3:42.5_0: Arahattamaggassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, sampahaṁsanā pariyosānaṁ.
ps1.3:42.9_0: Yo tassa paripantho tato cittaṁ visujjhati,
ps1.3:42.10_1: yañca visuddhattā cittaṁ majjhimaṁ samathanimittaṁ paṭipajjati,
ps1.3:43.4_0: Visuddhaṁ cittaṁ ajjhupekkhati, samathapaṭipannaṁ ajjhupekkhati, ekattupaṭṭhānaṁ ajjhupekkhati.
ps1.3:44.9_0: Evaṁ tivattagataṁ cittaṁ tividhakalyāṇakaṁ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṁ vitakkasampannañceva hoti vicārasampannañca
ps1.3:44.9_1: pītisampannañca sukhasampannañca cittassa adhiṭṭhānasampannañca saddhāsampannañca vīriyasampannañca satisampannañca
ps1.3:47.1_0: Kathaṁ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇā na honti,
ps1.3:47.1_1: na cime tayo dhammā aviditā honti,
ps1.3:47.4_0: Rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṁ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā hoti;
ps1.3:47.5_0: na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti.
ps1.3:47.6_0: Na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti.
ps1.3:47.10_0: Yathā rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṁ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā hoti,
ps1.3:47.10_1: na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti,
ps1.3:47.10_2: na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā aviditā honti,
ps1.3:47.11_0: Evamevaṁ bhikkhu nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā nisinno hoti,
ps1.3:47.11_1: na āgate vā gate vā assāsapassāse manasi karoti,
ps1.3:47.11_2: na āgatā vā gatā vā assāsapassāsā aviditā honti,
ps1.3:48.10_0: Evaṁ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇā na honti,
ps1.3:48.10_1: na cime tayo dhammā aviditā honti,
ps1.3:50.3_0: Assāsavasena upaṭṭhānaṁ sati, passāsavasena upaṭṭhānaṁ sati.
ps1.3:51.1_0: Yo assasati tassupaṭṭhāti, yo passasati tassupaṭṭhāti.
ps1.3:51.2_0: **Paripuṇṇā**ti pariggahaṭṭhena paripuṇṇā, parivāraṭṭhena paripuṇṇā, paripūraṭṭhena paripuṇṇā.
ps1.3:51.5_0: Tassime cattāro bhāvanaṭṭhā yānīkatā honti vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā.
ps1.3:52.1_0: **Yānīkatā**ti yattha yattha ākaṅkhati tattha tattha vasippatto hoti balappatto vesārajjappatto.
ps1.3:52.2_0: Tassa me te dhammā āvajjanapaṭibaddhā honti ākaṅkhapaṭibaddhā manasikārapaṭibaddhā cittuppādapaṭibaddhā.
ps1.3:52.5_0: **Vatthukatā**ti yasmiṁ yasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ cittaṁ svādhiṭṭhitaṁ hoti,
ps1.3:52.5_1: tasmiṁ tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ sati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
ps1.3:52.6_0: Yasmiṁ yasmiṁ vā pana vatthusmiṁ sati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti,
ps1.3:52.6_1: tasmiṁ tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ cittaṁ svādhiṭṭhitaṁ hoti.
ps1.3:52.9_0: **Anuṭṭhitā**ti vatthusmiṁ yena yena cittaṁ abhinīharati tena tena sati anuparivattati.
ps1.3:52.10_0: Yena yena vā pana sati anuparivattati tena tena cittaṁ abhinīharati.
ps1.3:52.13_0: **Paricitā**ti pariggahaṭṭhena paricitā, parivāraṭṭhena paricitā, paripūraṭṭhena paricitā.
ps1.3:52.14_0: Satiyā pariggaṇhanto jināti pāpake akusale dhamme.
ps1.3:53.3_0: Ye tattha jātā anavajjā kusalā bodhipakkhiyā—
ps1.3:53.6_0: Yaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ nirodho nibbānaṁ—
ps1.3:53.8_0: Iti idañca samaṁ idañca susamaṁ ñātaṁ hoti diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya.
ps1.3:54.1_0: **Anupubbaṁ paricitā**ti dīghaṁ assāsavasena purimā purimā paricitā, pacchimā pacchimā anuparicitā.
ps1.3:54.2_0: Dīghaṁ passāsavasena purimā purimā paricitā, pacchimā pacchimā anuparicitā.
ps1.3:54.3_0: Rassaṁ assāsavasena purimā purimā paricitā, pacchimā pacchimā anuparicitā.
ps1.3:54.4_0: Rassaṁ passāsavasena purimā purimā paricitā, pacchimā pacchimā anuparicitā …pe…
ps1.3:54.5_0: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasena purimā purimā paricitā, pacchimā pacchimā anuparicitā.
ps1.3:54.6_0: Paṭinissaggānupassī passāsavasena purimā purimā paricitā, pacchimā pacchimā anuparicitā.
ps1.3:54.7_0: Sabbāpi soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassatiyo aññamaññaṁ paricitā ceva honti anuparicitā ca.
ps1.3:56.1_0: **Buddho**ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
ps1.3:57.27_0: Vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ—
ps1.3:57.30_0: nirodhe patiṭṭhāpakattho yathattho yathā buddhena desito.
ps1.3:58.2_0: **Loko**ti khandhaloko dhātuloko āyatanaloko vipattibhavaloko vipattisambhavaloko sampattibhavaloko sampattisambhavaloko.
ps1.3:58.8_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ obhāseti bhāseti pabhāseti.
ps1.3:58.10_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ obhāseti bhāseti pabhāseti.
ps1.3:58.12_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ obhāseti bhāseti pabhāseti …pe…

ps1.3:59.1_0: **Abbhā muttova candimā**ti yathā abbhā, evaṁ kilesā.
ps1.3:59.4_0: Yathā cando abbhā mutto mahikā mutto dhūmarajā mutto rāhugahaṇā vippamutto bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate ca,
ps1.3:59.4_1: evamevaṁ bhikkhu sabbakilesehi vippamutto bhāsate ca tapate ca virocate ca.
ps1.3:60.2_0: Idha bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
ps1.3:61.4_0: **Bhikkhū**ti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā hoti bhikkhu sekkho vā arahā vā akuppadhammo.
ps1.3:61.6_0: **Rukkhamūlan**ti yattha bhikkhuno āsanaṁ paññattaṁ hoti mañco vā pīṭhaṁ vā bhisi vā taṭṭikā vā cammakhaṇḍo
ps1.3:61.6_1: vā tiṇasantharo vā paṇṇasantharo vā palālasantharo vā,
ps1.3:61.6_2: tattha bhikkhu caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṁ vā kappeti.
ps1.3:61.7_0: **Suññan**ti kenaci anākiṇṇaṁ hoti gahaṭṭhehi vā pabbajitehi vā.
ps1.3:61.9_0: **Nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā**ti nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā.
ps1.3:61.10_0: **Ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāyā**ti ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito supaṇihito.
ps1.3:62.1_0: **Satova assasati, sato passasatī**ti bāttiṁsāya ākārehi sato kārī hoti.
ps1.3:62.2_0: Dīghaṁ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
ps1.3:62.3_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hoti.
ps1.3:62.4_0: Dīghaṁ passāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
ps1.3:62.5_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hoti.
ps1.3:62.6_0: Rassaṁ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
ps1.3:62.7_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hoti.
ps1.3:62.8_0: Rassaṁ passāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
ps1.3:62.9_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hoti …pe…

ps1.3:62.12_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sato kārī hoti.
ps1.3:63.3_0: Dīghaṁ assāsapassāsaṁ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatopi passasatopi chando uppajjati.
ps1.3:63.4_0: Chandavasena tato sukhumataraṁ dīghaṁ assāsaṁ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati,
ps1.3:63.4_1: chandavasena tato sukhumataraṁ dīghaṁ passāsaṁ addhānasaṅkhāte passasati,
ps1.3:63.4_2: chandavasena tato sukhumataraṁ dīghaṁ assāsapassāsaṁ addhānasaṅkhāte assasatipi passasatipi.

ps1.3:63.6_0: Pāmojjavasena tato sukhumataraṁ dīghaṁ assāsaṁ addhānasaṅkhāte assasati,
ps1.3:63.6_1: pāmojjavasena tato sukhumataraṁ dīghaṁ passāsaṁ addhānasaṅkhāte passasati,

ps1.3:117.4_0: Dīghaṁ passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi …pe…
ps1.3:117.6_0: samādahaṁ cittaṁ passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps1.3:117.7_0: Yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṁ samādhibalaṁ sammāsamādhi—
ps1.3:117.9_0: Samādahaṁ cittaṁ assāsapassāsavasena viññāṇaṁ cittaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ sati anupassanā ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.3:117.12_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena taṁ cittaṁ anupassati.
ps1.3:118.6_0: samādahaṁ cittaṁ assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato …pe…
ps1.3:119.1_0: Kathaṁ “vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī”ti sikkhati?
ps1.3:119.2_0: “Rāgato vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “rāgato vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:119.3_0: “Dosato vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “dosato vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passasissāmī”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:119.12_0: Vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assāsapassāsavasena viññāṇaṁ cittaṁ upaṭṭhānaṁ sati …pe….
ps1.3:120.6_0: vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato …pe…
ps1.3:121.1_0: Aṭṭha anupassanāñāṇāni aṭṭha ca upaṭṭhānānussatiyo cattāri suttantikavatthūni citte cittānupassanāya.
ps1.3:122.6_0: Pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ udayaṁ passanto kati lakkhaṇāni passati,
ps1.3:122.7_0: Pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ udayaṁ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passati,
ps1.3:122.8_0: Pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ udayabbayaṁ passanto imāni paññāsa lakkhaṇāni passati.
ps1.3:123.1_0: “Rūpe aniccānupassī assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “rūpe aniccānupassī passasissāmī”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:123.8_0: Aniccānupassī assāsapassāsavasena dhammā upaṭṭhānaṁ sati anupassanā ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.3:123.11_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:124.6_0: aniccānupassī assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato …pe…
ps1.3:125.2_0: Rūpe ādīnavaṁ disvā rūpavirāge chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps1.3:125.3_0: “Rūpe virāgānupassī assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “rūpe virāgānupassī passasissāmī”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:125.9_0: jarāmaraṇe ādīnavaṁ disvā jarāmaraṇavirāge chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto,
ps1.3:125.11_0: Virāgānupassī assāsapassāsavasena dhammā upaṭṭhānaṁ sati anupassanā ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.3:125.14_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:126.6_0: virāgānupassī assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato …pe…
ps1.3:127.2_0: Rūpe ādīnavaṁ disvā rūpanirodhe chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps1.3:127.3_0: “Rūpe nirodhānupassī assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “rūpe nirodhānupassī passasissāmī”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:127.9_0: jarāmaraṇe ādīnavaṁ disvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto,
ps1.3:130.5_0: imehi aṭṭhahākārehi avijjānirodhe chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto, cittañcassa svādhiṭṭhitaṁ.
ps1.3:130.6_0: “Avijjāya nirodhānupassī assasissāmī”ti sikkhati, “avijjāya nirodhānupassī passasissāmī”ti sikkhati.
ps1.3:131.1_0: Katihākārehi saṅkhāresu ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi saṅkhārā nirujjhanti …pe…
ps1.3:131.2_0: katihākārehi viññāṇe ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi viññāṇaṁ nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.3_0: katihākārehi nāmarūpe ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi nāmarūpaṁ nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.4_0: katihākārehi saḷāyatane ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi saḷāyatanaṁ nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.5_0: katihākārehi phasse ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi phasso nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.6_0: katihākārehi vedanāya ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi vedanā nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.7_0: katihākārehi taṇhāya ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi taṇhā nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.8_0: katihākārehi upādāne ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi upādānaṁ nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.9_0: katihākārehi bhave ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi bhavo nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.10_0: katihākārehi jātiyā ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi jāti nirujjhati …
ps1.3:131.11_0: katihākārehi jarāmaraṇe ādīnavo hoti, katihākārehi jarāmaraṇaṁ nirujjhati?
ps1.3:131.12_0: Pañcahākārehi jarāmaraṇe ādīnavo hoti, aṭṭhahākārehi jarāmaraṇaṁ nirujjhati.
ps1.3:133.10_0: Imehi pañcahākārehi jarāmaraṇe ādīnavaṁ disvā imehi aṭṭhahākārehi jarāmaraṇanirodhe chandajāto hoti saddhādhimutto,
ps1.3:133.12_0: Nirodhānupassī assāsapassāsavasena dhammā upaṭṭhānaṁ sati anupassanā ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.3:133.15_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:134.6_0: nirodhānupassī assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato …pe…
ps1.3:135.19_0: Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsapassāsavasena dhammā upaṭṭhānaṁ sati anupassanā ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.3:135.22_0: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena te dhamme anupassati.
ps1.3:136.14_0: imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkhati jānanto sikkhati …pe…
ps1.3:137.1_0: Paṭinissaggānupassī assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānato viditā vedanā uppajjanti,
ps1.3:137.2_0: paṭinissaggānupassī assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṁ avikkhepaṁ pajānanto indriyāni samodhāneti gocarañca pajānāti samatthañca paṭivijjhati;
ps1.3:137.6_0: dhamme samodhāneti gocarañca pajānāti samatthañca paṭivijjhati.
ps1.3:139.1_0: Aṭṭha anupassane ñāṇāni aṭṭha ca upaṭṭhānānussatiyo cattāri suttantikavatthūni dhammesu dhammānupassanāya.
ps1.3:140.2_0: Dīghaṁ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi,
ps1.3:140.2_1: dīghaṁ passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi …pe…
ps1.3:140.3_0: vimocayaṁ cittaṁ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi,
ps1.3:140.3_1: vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passāsavasena cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi.
ps1.3:141.3_1: vimocayaṁ cittaṁ passāsaṁ aniccato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā,
ps1.3:142.3_0: nibbidāñāṇaṁ, aniccānupassī passasaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passatīti—
ps1.3:142.6_0: nibbidāñāṇaṁ, paṭinissaggānupassī passasaṁ yathābhūtaṁ jānāti passatīti—
ps1.3:143.2_0: Aniccānupassī assasaṁ bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā nibbidānulome ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:143.2_1: aniccānupassī passasaṁ bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā nibbidānulome ñāṇaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:143.3_0: paṭinissaggānupassī assasaṁ bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā nibbidānulome ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:143.3_1: paṭinissaggānupassī passasaṁ bhayatupaṭṭhāne paññā nibbidānulome ñāṇaṁ—
ps1.3:144.2_0: Aniccānupassī assasaṁ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā nibbidāpaṭippassaddhiñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:144.2_1: aniccānupassī passasaṁ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā nibbidāpaṭippassaddhiñāṇaṁ …pe…
ps1.3:144.3_0: paṭinissaggānupassī assasaṁ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā nibbidāpaṭippassaddhiñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:144.3_1: paṭinissaggānupassī passasaṁ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā nibbidāpaṭippassaddhiñāṇaṁ—
ps1.3:145.2_0: Sotāpattimaggena sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā samucchinnattā uppajjati vimuttisukhe ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:145.2_1: vicikicchāya pahīnattā samucchinnattā uppajjati vimuttisukhe ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:145.3_1: vicikicchānusayassa pahīnattā samucchinnattā uppajjati vimuttisukhe ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:145.4_2: paṭighānusayassa pahīnattā samucchinnattā uppajjati vimuttisukhe ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:145.5_2: paṭighānusayassa pahīnattā samucchinnattā uppajjati vimuttisukhe ñāṇaṁ,
ps1.3:145.6_4: avijjānusayassa pahīnattā samucchinnattā uppajjati vimuttisukhe ñāṇaṁ.
ps1.3:145.8_0: Soḷasavatthukaṁ ānāpānassatisamādhiṁ bhāvayato samadhikāni imāni dve ñāṇasatāni uppajjanti.
